summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Fifty-seventh Street, in the City of Seattle, from Ninth Avenue Northwest to Twenty-sixth Avenue Northwest, by regrading, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks, with all necessary appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 1501 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
